body_html: Thanks a lot! I will give it a try later. Would this work for Eager on GPU? I am not sure whether this issue is only related to the gc on host. As the author mentioned at first, the problem could also be caused by insufficient GPU memory allocation.

body: Thanks a lot! I will give it a try later. Would this work for Eager on GPU? I am not sure whether this issue is only related to the gc on host. As the author mentioned at first, the problem could also be caused by insufficient GPU memory allocation.
